name: 陳琬萍
objective:
在日常生活中經常會見到統計的應用，在讀取許多統計數據之時，我們必須要具有基本的統計概念才不會被數據所誤導。本課程利用 Excel 統計分析的功能，介紹基本的統計方法，藉由生活中應用之實例，將問卷設計、資料蒐集與分析、統計結果之解釋等，做一系列之介紹。
We usually use statistics in our daily life, but in many cases, we should have basic statistic concept, otherwise we maybe misleading by the data.  In this lesson, we use statistic analysis function of Excel as a useful tool.  Introduce basic method of statistic, show the procedure of questionnaire design, data collection and analysis, explanation of result etc., by use the example in our daily life.
schedule:
Week 01 -- Statistics and Life
Week 02 -- Data Collection and Organization
Week 03 -- Statistical Population and Sample
Week 04 -- Descriptive Statistics
Week 05 -- Statistic Diagrams
Week 06 -- Permutations and Combinations
Week 07 -- Probability and Expectation
Week 08 -- Random Variables and Common Probability Distributions I
Week 09 -- Midterm
Week 10 -- Random Variables and Common Probability Distributions II
Week 11 -- Sampling Distribution
Week 12 -- Sampling Error and Confidence Intervals
Week 13 -- Hypothesis Testing
Week 14 -- Regression Analysis
Week 15 -- Applications of Regression Analysis
Week 16 -- Application of statistics
Week 17 -- Application of statistics
Week 18 -- Final
remarks: 課程對應 SDGs 指標：教育品質指標對應授課內容：Applications of Regression Analysis and Applications of Statistics -- 利用統計分析工具探勘資料 -- 對應指標 4.a.1：資訊科技融入教學及數位學習的學校比率。
